website_summaries.verdict: Outdoor lovers who are after a comfortable and lightweight pair may find what they’re looking for in the Under Armour Infil Ops GTX. Its breathability, traction, and waterproofness are also handy attributes for any adventure. However, the footgear’s narrow fit might not be suitable for everyone. All in all, the Infil Ops GTX from Under Armour can be a great addition to any trip because of the excellent qualities it offers.
pros: Hordes of buyers are delighted with the comfort level of the Under Armour Infil Ops GTX
Numerous purchasers hail the hiking boot’s lightness as nothing short of incredible
Its breathability is top-notch, as testified by a bunch of outdoor enthusiasts
A handful of online reviewers say that this Under Armour product doesn't have a long break-in period
The Vibram outsole’s grip performance has left a good impression on several consumers
The minority reports that the Infil Ops GTX conquered various wet trail conditions
cons: Several adventurers are dismayed with the narrow fit of this hiking boot

customer_reviews.title: Best Boot I've bought in LE in years.....However not a year in starting to fall apart.
customer_reviews.text: Had to change from 5 stars to 3. Great boot really is, but I'm not even that hard on my boots, yet they starting to fall apart. Mainly in the material, tongue, where the soft material meets the rough material. -No break in period -Comfy -Light -Sturdy -Better than Danner, fit true and doesn't pinch my feet.
customer_reviews.author: A.Slade

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product... hands down worth every penny. Was worried at first that the height of the boot would be uncomfortable but after the first day of my 10 hour shift I was proved wrong. They r so light and so durable. If these buffalo winters can handle these boots I’m sure anything can. Highly recommend for law enforcement or anyone who’s on their feet for long hours or for those who have to chase and run after people in deep snow and extremely cold temperatures!
customer_reviews.author: b-lo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable dry boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I have a problem with my feet getting hot and finding boots that don't leave my feet sweaty, and then cold, has been tough. So far these have been the best I've tried. I've worn them in heat and cold, dry, wet, and frozen. I do still make sure I use the right socks for the weather but my feet stay dry. Comfortable, waterproof, and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: abcheck

customer_reviews.title: Light and strong
customer_reviews.text: My job is line Service at a private airport I walk about 5 miles a day. With that in mind when I ordered the boots they were a little small but I have wide flat feet so it’s hard to fit my foot. Also they were very nice in replacing them with another size. After about a week of breaking them in I love these boots. They are light and Easy to get around in. I will go from under an aircraft to climbing a ladder to fuel it and these boots make it easy for me. Great tread string laces and I’m two months into using them daily. My feet feel great after work. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NLB

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent Boots, they are just perfectly made for ME! I love them! I have several Under Armour products, including several sandals & Boots with the FAT TIRE soles. These are in a totally different category and design level. I recommend for serious men with the need for serious boots in a life or death situation!
customer_reviews.author: catman

customer_reviews.title: These Boots are Bad Ass
customer_reviews.text: Narrow for my foot, I’m a men’s 8, I got a Fat wide foot, these boots are made narrow, had to order 1 size up, they fit perfect, light weight & Comfortable, very grounded to the floor feeling (not in a bad way), get a lot of compliments, I where them All year round, never cold or hot in them.
customer_reviews.author: Ilovepink

customer_reviews.title: Get them!
customer_reviews.text: If you're thinking about buying these, just buy them! You won't regret it! I waited forever trying to get a paid, because they were always on back order. I finally seen them in stock and on prime! I jumped on it! They fit great, no.break in required. They look great too! Everyone has been asking me where they could get a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATER PROOF
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable boot I’ve ever owned. I’ve bee wearing them about 60 hours a week while working as a paramedic. They’ve held up well after about 6 month of use.. however I don’t see them lasting over 2 years. One major problem I’ve encountered is they are not water proof (as advertised). Water seeps in through the seam where the sole meets the boot. This is super disappointing seeing as this is a 250 dollar boot.
customer_reviews.author: MKErescue

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, no regrets.
customer_reviews.text: My old pair of Underarmour boots had worn out (they were pretty old), so this is my second pair. I was reluctant to spend so much on them but they were worth it. These are incredibly comfortable, as well they should be for the price. I just wish they had speedlaces because getting in and out of them is time-consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the best construction I have seen for a boot this light.
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this boot, except they make me keep my toenails short. I will not return them since they will aid in better hygiene. I'm kidding, the fit about a 1/2 size smaller than all of the other UnderArmor boots I wear. Other than that, love them!
customer_reviews.author: David A. Dibean

customer_reviews.title: Too much arch support
customer_reviews.text: Arch support in these is very high. Hopefully these boots will break in more, but for now the arches inside the shoe are very very high. Feels like I'm standing on golf balls. I do not suffer from flat feet, or anything, however these are just simply too high.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Poltar

customer_reviews.title: Best work boots
customer_reviews.text: These are the best work boots my HVAC husband has ever had. He first got them from UA direct when our son worked there. Glad to find them here on amazon now.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Wear and feel as expected
customer_reviews.text: Am a 9.5 in many other brands and these, (in a 9.5)fit like a glove and are ready to wear straight from the box.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Davies

customer_reviews.title: They are Really water proof
customer_reviews.text: Love that my husband can wear them to work and not worry about those nasty rainy days when he use to come home with smelly feet because his old boot got soaked in the rain. These are water resistant/proof. He actually has two pair one for work and one for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Maybeline

customer_reviews.title: Dark knights boots
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of these then all of the sudden I felt the urge to fight crime to take on the unjust and most importantly vengeance. After my purchase I would only dream Under Armour would finish my wardrobe because if they can make Bruce Wayne's boots they could create the whole outfit and it would be incredible. P.s. I Am Batman
customer_reviews.author: Trevor woodhall

customer_reviews.title: So stylish you don't want to step in dirt
customer_reviews.text: This brand know how to make stylish boots that will dip in mud eventually
customer_reviews.author: Martin Boghossian

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: these are better built then the low versions but they are still not that great
customer_reviews.author: Brock & Jess

customer_reviews.title: Not all the comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These where not all the comfortable which was disappointing. I also felt like these where extremely heavy as I was looking for a lightweight tactical boot.
customer_reviews.author: Man of Steel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot, not for long distance hiking
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, excellent waterproofing, rock solid lacing, room for orthotics, great Vibram tread, overall a very solid boot. Has lasted me 2 years so far, no seam problems/leaking whatsoever, Vibram treads have held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Uff Da Guy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit well; too small and way too high of an arch
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit well; too small and way too high of an arch.
customer_reviews.author: Foe-hammer

customer_reviews.title: ... you wear size 11 get the size 11 1/2 great shoes I have two different colors on
customer_reviews.text: My experience in this shoes that if you wear size 11 get the size 11 1/2 great shoes I have two different colors on this
customer_reviews.author: mitch zantua

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not black.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but the suede is an O.D. Greeb color and not black as the photo shows and do not comply with my department's uniform policy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these feels like walking on air, no exaggeration. If you're just looking for the best for your feet, to say that these are 'good' may feel like an understatement.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Great traction in spring snow and icy conditions. So far so good. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: miguel

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof & comfort,lite weight
customer_reviews.text: I use these for work outdoors all day long in fields installing solar, it literally poured for last 2 days & my feet stayed 100% dry, I am beyond impressed but then again that's why everything I wear comes from Under Armour!
customer_reviews.author: Calvin j blowers

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing them for about 2 months now. Snug fit but not tight. I work 12 hour shifts and they are comfortable for all 12 hours. My 1st pair of UA boots but highly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable boot. I have them on for about 10 hours a day with no problems yet. Like the rubber sole.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge_Orwa

customer_reviews.title: High Speed!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome. They look great and fit like a glove. I’ve only worn them twice, so I will revisit this review in 6 months. I’m a teacher and plan to use these specific for our Outdoor Education field trip in October. More to come.......
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Too high of price, would have purchased long ago if price was 30-35% low.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots but the price makes them nearly impossible to own. If the price was closer to $160, I would have purchased these long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Abel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tactical boots.
customer_reviews.text: Just an awesome boot. It's a shame Under Armor doesn't consider that women like these too and there's no size option for them.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Super light. I work patrol in the mountains of western NC. days, nights, rain, and cold my feet feel the same. They truly are water proof. Very impressed and love the grip.
customer_reviews.author: Tim R

customer_reviews.title: Daddy tested, Marine approved
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, about a 1/4 size large. Stands up to harsh environment and daily use, but not very breathable. Good product after all.
customer_reviews.author: James Smith

customer_reviews.title: great boots
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable boots, walked through man streams and snow withoutthe any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Michael V.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot
customer_reviews.text: Great look and feel. Very light weight. I was on the fence before purchasing because of the cost. I’ve always been more of RedWing boot guy and never really thought of UA as a boot maker but these boots are legit. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of boots I've owned
customer_reviews.text: A note on size first, if you wear wide, these don't come in wide so order a size up. I usually wear 11-11.5 2E and I got a 12 and they fit better from go than any pair of boots I've owned. After breaking them in over a week, they are insanely comfortable and I wear boots all day every day. These handle incredibly well in everything from an urban setting with slipping hazards to a wilderness setting scaling scree slopes and naked rock. UA and Vibram make a hell of a team
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Johnson

customer_reviews.title: UA
customer_reviews.text: Light wight boot that feels durable with a good look.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: A little spendy
customer_reviews.text: They run a half size small. Very light, seem to be a well constructed boot. So far they're worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Seth William Dappen

customer_reviews.title: Support
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my grandson and he said they were great help support his ankles very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: One of the best boots I've had low break in time very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots , being in the Army for 20 years , these the best ever worn
customer_reviews.author: Galen hutchins

customer_reviews.title: great comfort, great product, and visual
customer_reviews.text: Its a well made pair of shoes that will last for a long time and in all weather.
customer_reviews.author: Quang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Solid and light
customer_reviews.text: Snug,wish toe cap was extended further down foot, might rub top of toe
customer_reviews.author: Sean Thin Elk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like very much this product but i have chosen the wrong size😔
customer_reviews.author: Treez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well built only been using it for a couple weeks now so we'll see if they hold up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Infil Ops
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely enjoy working on my feet for 18 hours with this pair of shoes! So far the best pair I ever had, a little pricey but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenio

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Order a half size to full size bigger than what you normally wear. They feel broken in right out of the box. They breathe amazingly. Great traction, excellent comfort, and they are waterproof. They look cool and I would wear these 24/7 if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Under Armour - Mens Infil Ops GTX Load Boots
product_meta.description: Breathable GORE-TEX® membrane is 100% waterproof but still allows sweat to escape so you stay dry. High abrasion textile upper with Anafoam™ overlay, anatomically molded for precise fit & support. Molded rubber toe cap. TPU stability chassis for heel lockdown & support. Scratch rubber heel overlay for durability. Cupron® Anti-Fungal Pro Fibers reduce odor & kill 99.9% of athlete's foot fungus after 12 hours of contact with the sockliner. Full-length EVA midsole with internal wishbone TPU plate. Vibram® outsole with MegaGrip rubber compound for dependable traction on any terrain. Height: 10".
feature_bullets: Breathable GORE-TEX membrane is 100% waterproof but still allows sweat to escape so you stay dry
High abrasion textile upper with Anafoam overlay, anatomically molded for precise fit & support
TPU stability chassis for heel lockdown & support
Scratch rubber heel overlay for durability
